title: Energy exchanged by heating during two processes

content.question: How much energy is exchanged between the system and its surroundings by heating as the gas is taken through the two processes, and is the energy added to or removed from the gas?

choices.label: <math alttext="2 P sub 0, end sub, V sub 0 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><msub><mrow><mi>P</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> added

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
